argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | brimage.1 | |- A e. _V |
| 2 |  | brimage.2 | |- B e. _V |
| 3 |  | #P_df-image | |- Image R = ( ( _V X. _V ) \ ran ( ( _V (x) _E ) (++) ( ( _E o. `' R ) (x) _V ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_brxp | |- ( A ( _V X. _V ) B <-> ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 4 | #P_mpbir2an | |- A ( _V X. _V ) B |
| 6 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 7 |  | #P_vex | |- y e. _V |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_brcnv | |- ( x `' R y <-> y R x ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_rexbii | |- ( E. y e. A x `' R y <-> E. y e. A y R x ) |
| 10 | 6, 1 | #P_coep | |- ( x ( _E o. `' R ) A <-> E. y e. A x `' R y ) |
| 11 | 6 | #P_elima | |- ( x e. ( R " A ) <-> E. y e. A y R x ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_3bitr4ri | |- ( x e. ( R " A ) <-> x ( _E o. `' R ) A ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 5, 12 | #P_brtxpsd3 | |- ( A Image R B <-> B = ( R " A ) ) |
